sentences.en: Bullish economists are rarer than hens'teeth.
sentences.cn: 看涨的经济学家凤毛麟角.

sentences.en: But depressing reports about the state of the trees that are still standing are much rarer.
sentences.cn: 但是,针对现存林木悲惨状况的报道更是少之又少.

sentences.en: Combined PN and Mycobacterium tuberculosis ( MTB ) infection is even rarer.
sentences.cn: 肺部土壤丝菌和肺结核合并感染更是罕见.

sentences.en: Conclusion IMFTS are rarer than IFPS.
sentences.cn: 结论肠道IMFTS比IFPS更 少见.

sentences.en: Fortunately, such cowboy firms are becoming rarer.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，这样的欺诈公司越来越少了。

sentences.en: Rich and stable cash flows are much rarer in emerging economies than in mature economies.
sentences.cn: 与成熟经济体相比,新兴经济体中的充裕而稳定的现金流要少得多.

sentences.en: Seeing that anti - bacterial drugs are in existence, acute bacterial endocarditis has become much rarer.
sentences.cn: 由于有了抗菌药物, 急性细菌性心内膜炎已少见得多了.

sentences.en: Single pontil examples, either single - gather or end - of - cane are rarer.
sentences.cn: 单铁棒的例子, 无论是单一或聚集最终的甘蔗是罕见.

sentences.en: Such accidents are rare. But they can andbe made rarer. That canbe done without compromising security.
sentences.cn: 这种(相撞)事故很少见, 不过就算在不影响安全的前提下它们也可以变得更少见.

sentences.en: The higher you climb up the mountain, the rarer the air be.
sentences.cn: 越往山上爬, 空气越稀薄.

sentences.en: The purer a diamond's color, rarer it is.
sentences.cn: 钻石的颜色越纯净, 越是稀有之物.

sentences.en: The results show that rarer variants are distributed more unevenly among populations.
sentences.cn: 本研究结果显示:越罕见的变体,其在人群中的分布也越不均衡.

sentences.en: There is something that is much more scarce, something rarer than ability.
sentences.cn: 有的东西比才能稀罕得多,珍贵得多, 这就是识别的能力.

sentences.en: These posters are rarer and hence very collectable.
sentences.cn: 这些海报非常罕见,因此非常有收藏价值.

sentences.en: Where extraterrestrial civilizations may be rare , there is something that is rarer still: A girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 虽说外星生命及其稀少, 但还是有一种生命比它更稀少: 女朋友.

trans.tran_cn: 更稀罕的，更珍贵的(rare的最高级)，罕见的( rare的比较级 )，极好的，稀薄的，肉半熟的
